sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>The character gains 1 boost die per rank of Command when making Leadership checks (or other checks to inspire, lead, or rally an audience). Inspired targets also add 1 boost die per rank to any subsequent Discipline checks they make over the next twenty-four hours (this does not increase with additional ranks of Command).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <name>Command</name> <number>TAL0001017</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:43:50</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dd4746e8db660c542901de90cf9619ff</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 16:43:50</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
